title: Frequency of Fear
description: Following the lingering echoes of the broadcast, you descend into the sealed Bio-Ward. The static on the radio is causing intense auditory hallucinations.

turns.narrative: The descent into the Bio-Ward is pitch black. The radio static sporadically whispers your name.
turns.choice_a: Turn the radio off to save your sanity (Willpower)
turns.consequence_a: You lose the guiding signal, forcing you to navigate blindly and walk right into an ambush.
turns.choice_b: Keep it on and endure the whispers
turns.consequence_b: You take minor psychic damage, but the signal guides you safely past a nest of mutated scavengers.

turns.narrative: You reach a massive steel bulkhead marked 'SUBJECT 7 CONTAINMENT'. The door is sealed with an electronic keypad.
turns.choice_a: Use the tuned radio to broadcast the code back at it
turns.consequence_a: The numbers sequence perfectly matches the lock. The heavy doors hiss open.
turns.choice_b: Pry the panel off and hardwire it (Thieves Tools)
turns.consequence_b: You bypass the lock, but trigger a silent alarm deeper in the facility.

silent_entry.description: You entered the containment sector without alerting the denizens.

alarm_triggered.description: You entered the facility, but something inside knows you are here.

conclusion: You entered the containment sector without alerting the denizens.

risk_matrix.critical_failure: The attempt failed with minor lasting consequences. The thread remains open.
